attributes.action: We need a clear plan on lockdown exit
attributes.additional_details:
As a self employed barber with no income i (like thousands of others) need to return to work.
The 4th seiss grant is apparently not out before March 3rd so what are we to do???
attributes.background: We need addressing as a country on how boris plans to lead us out of this lockdown

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Publish Exit Plans for all lockdowns and restrictions relating to Coronavirus.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556104

In addition, the Prime Minister is due to set out a 'roadmap' for easing coronavirus restrictions later this month, on February 22. See:
https://www.politicshome.com/news/article/boris-johnson-confirms-roadmap-out-of-lockdown-to-be-revealed-on-22-feb-starting-with-school-reopening-on-8-march

If there are specific changes you would like to see to that plan, you could start a petition calling for those changes, once it has been announced.
